name: SmokeSignal
author: Daniel Hrenak

sections.description: This plugin allows you to communicate with other registered users of you wordpress blog/website/portal easily inside admin interface. There is possibility to create groups, assign users to them and communicate only with users from the selected group.
sections.installation:
You can download and install SmokeSignal using the built in WordPress plugin installer. If you download SmokeSignal manually, make sure it is uploaded to /wp-content/plugins/smokesignal/.

Activate SmokeSignal in the Plugins admin panel using the Activate link.
